reviewText: Nice Las Vegas show with a nice mixtures of Miracles & solo tunes.Nice to see Claudette,his 1st wife & Miracles member in the audience.Seller A+.Quick delivery.

reviewText: Absolutely love this DVD. I have always loved Smokey Robinson. This is the first DVD that I came across of him. He doesn't disappoint. He's very entertaining and sings so good. I just wish I could have been the one that he sang I Love Your Face, to in the concert.
Title: N/A

reviewText: I have been a Smokey fan since the sixties when he came on thescene.The think what they did at Motown back then will never beduplicated in any shape, form or fashion. Since Motown will not release footage of concerts from their former acts...it was really great to get this DVD. I play it all day on weekends and his CD's everyday on my way to work. I saw Smokey Robinson at the Resorts International in Atlantic City June 7, 2003 and hestill got it. His voice gets better with age and so does he. Youfeel like you are the only person in the concert hall. I wish there were more concerts of his on DVD, I have the other one too.Keep doing what you do BEST...Simply the Best.

reviewText: An excellent show - he's quite the entertainer.  Worth buying.  Video is excellent and audio is very good - but only is Dolby 2.0.
summary: great show, only missing 5.1 or DTS

reviewText: What a gem this DVD concert is!  I've loved Smokey Robinson's writing and voice for years and this is a fan's dream.  From the moment Smokey walks on stage, you can tell that a "love affair" is taking place: he loves his audience and they love him.  Great songs, great production.  I'm glad I found this!
Title: N/A

reviewText: First let me say, that most of the DVD concerts offered of Old School classic artists are either of very poor quality or show the artists performing a lousy set of song selctions.  I know because I collect DVD concerts whenever I can find good ones.  Unfortunately, Amazon often fails to list the songs performed on a specific DVD, making it more difficult to select a good concert.  This DVD is the exception.  Smokey is on top of his game and at his best in this concert!  Additionally, he performs some of his greatest hits, some of which he has not performed in a long time.  As a bonus he performs some more recent songs which are in the classic Smokey style and tradition!...All Smokey fans must get this DVD!
Title: N/A

reviewText: This Smokey Robinson DVD is a must have, he performs  all of his early hits and the hits that he wrote for the "Temptations". Smokey even sing songs from his new material recorded at his new record company. His background singers and band were superb.  This DVD " REALLY HAD A HOLD ON ME "
summary: Smokey Robinson : The Greatest Hit Live

reviewText: I have been blessed to see Smokey live on a number of occasions and this show does little to expose the real Smokey. If you just love Smokey then buy it, otherwise settle for the cd.

reviewText: Smokey looked good, sounded good and gave the audience a beautiful variety of music, showing his vocal versatility!!! This DVD is a must for 'TRUE' Smokey fans! The musical selections and arrangements makes this a very entertainng DVD!Hey Smoke, keep on doing what you're doing!With lots of love, from your 'ol Howard Theater days poetry friend...
